FuncDef: This command configures the IPv6 Link Local address that is used as a virtual SRRP IPv6 address by the Master SRRP node. This address is sent in the Router Advertisements initiated by the Master SRRP node. Clients use this address as IPv6 default-gateway. Both SRRP nodes, Master and Backup, must be configured with the same Link Local address.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IPv6 address in the form:.
